content: I am not capable of predicting the future. the trade relationship between the us and china is complex and involves multiple factors, including political, economic, and diplomatic issues. the us and china have engaged in several rounds of negotiations to address their trade disputes, but as of now, it is unclear when a resolution will be reached. the ongoing covid-19 pandemic has also further complicated the situation. however, both countries have expressed an interest in resolving their differences and continuing their trade relationship. it is possible that with further negotiations and cooperation, the trade relationship between the us and china could improve in the future.
